body: The hooked end of this axe's blade can be used to disarm foes or pull them off balance. A hooked axe can be used as a martial weapon (in which case it functions like a battleaxe).
name: Hooked Axe
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Mastering Combat/Gladiator Weapons/Gladiator Weapon Descriptions/Hooked Axe
